newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Maxim started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Maxim started as buy.

text.p: -- Prudential Securities analyst Wayne Hood initiated coverage of Maxim Group Inc with a buy rating, his office said.
-- In a research note, Hood said the company's August merger with carpet manufacturer Image Industries will provide Maxim -- a large floor-covering retailer -- with vertical integration.

-- "Image has a unique niche because it produces its own polyester fiber and then makes the carpet. No other carpet mill produces its own fiber and then makes the carpet. Furthermore, Maxim gains a source of low-cost carpet and a proprietary source of private lable carpet lines," according to the analyst.
-- "We believe Maxim's retailing strategy is not well-known and the benefits the company should get from the Image Industries merger are probably underestimated," he added.
-- Hood's 1997 earnings estimate is $1.10 per share, up from an estimated $0.50 per share in 1996 and a loss of $0.30 per share in 1995.
-- Shares rose 1-1/4 to 17 in midmorning Nasdaq trade, reaching a new high.
